intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects to reduce the brightness of the lights in the dining room because it is currently too bright.  
Constraints & cues: The user has multiple meross light strips in the dining room, with current brightness levels of 70%, 48%, and 35%. The user has not specified which light strip to adjust or the desired brightness level.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding which specific light strip to adjust and what the target brightness level should be; clarification is needed to avoid incorrect adjustments.

2) 当前状态及控制提示：所有设备的健康状态尚未检查。第一个设备的亮度为70%，第二个设备的亮度为48%，第三个设备的亮度为35%。用户提到“餐厅太亮”，因此需要考虑降低亮度。可以使用开关能力来控制设备的开关状态，使用亮度调节能力来调整亮度。
